title: Math-Viz: PDE Visualization Framework
text:
PDE Visualization Framework ‚Äî Solve and visualize Partial Differential Equations with real-time 3D rendering and interactive simulations.



Want to try it out right now?
‚Üí Launch Web App (No installation needed!)











Feature
Description




üî¢ Finite Difference Solver
Explicit solver with built-in stability control


üìà Real-time 3D Visualization
Interactive plots with analytical comparison


üéØ 35+ Boundary Conditions
Pre-configured BC functions for quick setup


üé¨ Animation Export
Generate MP4 videos of simulations


üñ•Ô∏è Dual Interface
Use via CLI or interactive web app









Visit Math-Viz Live ‚Üí
No setup required. Start visualizing PDEs immediately.



View Source Code ‚Üí
Clone the repo and run locally with full control.
git clone https://github.com/NoahWotschke/Math-Viz.git
cd Math-Viz






Solve heat equation, wave equation, Schr√∂dinger equation, and more
Set custom boundary conditions
Visualize solutions in real-time 3D
Compare numerical vs analytical solutions
Export animations for reports/presentations





üöÄ In Active Development
New features and improvements coming soon!





GitHub Repository ‚Äî Full documentation and source code
Live Demo ‚Äî Try it now
